abstract: On this week's podcast, Frank Rich talks about the life of the film critic Pauline Kael; Richard Brookhiser discusses his new biography of James Madison; and Jennifer Schuessler has best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.
snippet: On this week's podcast, Frank Rich talks about the life of the film critic Pauline Kael; Richard Brookhiser discusses his new biography of James Madison; and Jennifer Schuessler has best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.
lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Book Review, Frank Rich reviews two books that chronicle the life and career of the contentious film critic Pauline Kael: "Pauline Kael: A Life in the Dark" by Brian Kellow and "The Age of Movies: Selected Writings of Pauline Kael," edited by Sanford Schwartz.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Frank Rich Discusses the Career of Pauline Kael
